A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: There is so much dumb in this movie... most scenes were cringe worthy and had the pervasive taint of bad humour. while it is important to cultivate star wars into the heart of younger viewers\, the poor plot lines and glaringly illogical decision making of the 'heroes' undermines the movie's appear to the adult audience. In short the movie lacks sufficient intelligence required to engage most viewers. Why cater to those watching the Teletubbies or Dora the Explorer\, when it's not the right age demographic?
